questions.question: Jack the Ripper preyed on this vulnerable class of women.
Son of Sam claimed that this told him to kill people.
questions.answer: A demon possessing his neighbour's dog

questions.question: This CBS series, entering its 10th season, follows a team of behavioural analysts who profile serial killers.
This is the Unabomber's real name.
This rare type of serial killer will intentionally harm people in order to be seen as the one who saves them.
